about_the_game:
Goblin Scout: I Won't Let You Level Up In My Monster Village, Our Strongest Warrior Will Use My Equipment To Beat You Up!

You are a goblin scout living in a goblin town. You might not be the strongest goblin in town, but you are the fastest.

Occasionally, your town comes under attack by heroes that try to level up by killing your fellow goblins. The town's strongest fighter goes out to meet them in turn based Active Time Battle, but is too weak on his own to defeat even the weakest of heroes. You, as the fastest in town, must bring him the items and equipment he needs to fight off these XP grinding heroes.

This game includes:

- First person platforming

- Turn based combat

- The above two at the same time in fact

- Short term resource and time management

- Silly dialogue with your neighbours

- A short playtime

This is an expanded version of a game made for Miziziziz' 4 Devs 1 Artkit series of videos.

name: I Won't Let You Level Up In My Goblin Town

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: 2.4GHZ Dual Core or Higher
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 460
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

short_description: You might not be the strongest goblin in town, but you are the fastest. When adventurers come to your town to grind EXP, your strongest warrior goblin meets them in Active Time Battle. Run around town gathering the equipment and potions he needs to defeat any grinding adventurer.
